label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_011
content:

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-02: CPU 84% | Mem 84% | Disk Used 98% | Disk Busy 96% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 9.1 Gbps / Out 7.9 Gbps
- stor-b-10: CPU 68% | Mem 74% | Disk Used 95% | Disk Busy 91% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 7.1 Gbps / Out 6.4 Gbps
- stor-c-18: CPU 61% | Mem 71% | Disk Used 92% | Disk Busy 85% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 5.9 Gbps / Out 5.3 Gbps
- meta-01: CPU 66% | Mem 89% | Disk Used 83% | Disk Busy 69% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 3.3 Gbps / Out 2.8 Gbps

### Connection Pools
(Information not provided in data sheet)

### CDN & Caching
(Information not provided in data sheet)

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] Disk predictive failure in stor-b-10: scheduled replacement window
- [WARNING] Quota hard blocks for 4 tenants
- [INFO] High ingest volume (+212 TB) triggered capacity review
- [INFO] Compaction pending approaching 100; overnight tuning scheduled

### Deployments & Changes
- Emergency capacity review initiated due to large batch ingest
- Quota hard blocks applied to four tenants; rate limits enforced
- Shard set drained and replacement scheduled for disk in stor-b-10
- Compaction concurrency tuned to reduce disk saturation and queued overnight

### Events
- Large batch ingest (+212 TB) drove overall utilization above 80%; initiated emergency capacity review and accelerated procurement timeline
- Disk in stor-b-10 reported predictive failure; drained shard set and scheduled replacement window with on-site tech
- Quota hard blocks for four tenants; implemented temporary per-tenant ingest rate limits and requested teams to shift older data to erasure-coded pool
- Compaction pending approached 100; tuned compaction concurrency down to reduce disk busy saturation and queued overnight catch-up run

### On-Call
- Shift: Avery C. 7 pages. 14 tickets. Status: Degraded; high utilization and heavy ingest causing compaction pressure and quota incidents. Hardware replacement scheduled and rate limits applied.
